Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm about to embark on the 2nd part of my campaign in unmanned missions with remote tech. Rovers!

However to my knowledge there isn't a way to store/keep experiments out of a science module to something.

as in manned science missions you would empty experiments that don't yield 100% transmission and store them in your capsule for bringing back to Kerbin later.

So my dilemma is my unmanned rover will not be able to cover many biomes as a lot of the experiment will not yield 100% transmission and i'l have to 'Keep' it in the science module thus effectively disabling that experiment.

Does anyone know of a solution to this? a mod or something?

TarsierSpaceTelescope comes with a science storage part ( well, two different sized ones ) - I haven't tried using them on uncrewed rovers though. Automated Science Sampler can auto transfer science to parts but I'm not sure of it's limitations yet. Those should be good places to start investigating though.

@PART[roverBody]:FINAL{

	%MODULE[ModuleScienceContainer]
	{
		name = ModuleScienceContainer

        reviewActionName = Review Stored Data
        storeActionName = Store Experiments
        evaOnlyStorage = False
        storageRange = 1.3
	}

}

Just insert the code above in a  cfg file anywhere in the gamedata folder,
